main.py --dataset sunrgbd --tasks semantic scene instance orientation --enable-panoptic --rgb-encoder-backbone resnet34 --rgb-encoder-backbone-block nonbottleneck1d --depth-encoder-backbone resnet34 --depth-encoder-backbone-block nonbottleneck1d --no-pretrained-backbone --input-modalities rgb depth --raw-depth --instance-offset-distance-threshold 40 --weights-filepath /home/sai/Desktop/multi-object-search/EMSANet/trained_models/sunrgbd/r34_NBt1D_pre.pth --hm3d-semantic-n-classes 37
